original_text: Such regulations indeed have an appearance of wisdom, with their self-imposed worship, their false humility and their harsh treatment of the body, but they lack any value in restraining sensual indulgence.
korean_text: 이런 것들은 자의적 숭배와 겸손과 몸을 괴롭게 하는 데는 지혜 있는 모양이나 오직 육체 따르는 것을 금하는 데는 조금도 유익이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: Such regulations indeed have an appearance of wisdom
sentences.korean_translation: 이러한 규정들은 지혜의 모습을 가지고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: and their harsh treatment of the body
